I am looking for the object I need : Being a Borrower

01-ASK

Once the desired object is found, I can get in touch with the owner of the object (Lender).

I ask some information or request the object giving the dates I am interested in.

I pay with Seeds that is the virtual currency on the platform (free of charge !)

If a deposit is asked, an electronic imprint of the credit card will be done (my data will be protected and the deposit not charged)

Once the Lender accepts my request, I set up an appointment to receive the object.

02-BORROW

Once I meet the Lender and have the object, we both have to notify the platform and update the status.

I enjoy the use of the object keeping it in a good condition !

When the period of borrowing goes to an end, I give back to the object to the owner.

03-REVIEW

I write a review to the borrower (of course, he can write one to me too)

Itâ€™s now my turn to lend my unused objects to the community :)

I have an object that I want to lend : Being a Lender

01 validation

I offer objects I can lend. (If requires I can ask a deposit for it)

Once I receive a request for the object, I can decide to accept it or not. I can modify or cancel. (Late cancellation will be updated to the profile). I determine the period of borrowing with the borrower.

I set up an appointment with the borrower for when the object will be picked up and when to return it.

02 Lend

I lend the object

I lend my object and confirm the update of the status.

To get the object back, I set an appointment

Once the object is returned, I check that it is in good condition and update the status on the platform.

03 REVIEW

I write a review to the borrower

I borrow the objects I desire in the community with the seeds freshly received.
